turkish_example_sentence: Ben dün akşam kütüphaneden eski Türk romanını alacaktım.
english_example_sentence: I was going to take the old Turkish novel from the library yesterday evening.
russian_example_sentence: Я собирался взять старый турецкий роман из библиотеки вчера вечером.
